CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 생산중, 생산 예약된 유닛의 갯수 표시 -- /ui/ProductionUI/ProductionInfo/UnitList/UnitInfoExample/NumOfProduction 경로의 UI에서 사용하는 Component

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity --------------------------------------------------------
local ProductionInfo = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/ProductionUI/ProductionInfo") local CalledBy = ProductionInfo.ProductionUIManager.CalledBy local Name = Entity.Parent.UnitInfoButton.Name local Cost = Entity.Parent.UnitInfoButton.Cost
if isvalid(CalledBy) then CalledBy.Barrack:Cancel(Name, Cost) else ProductionInfo:SetVisible(false) ProductionInfo:SetEnable(false) end
